description: Million Bells Terra Cotta is a stunningly beautiful flower with a unique color combination. Its brilliant oblong petals are a unique and beautiful terracotta orange on the outside and citrus yellow within. Flowering in the summer and fall they can reach up to 12 inches of height. With a low maintenance care and long-lasting blooms it is the perfect plant to add color and cheer to the your garden. The long trailing foliage adds an interesting texture to the container gardens. They are drought tolerant and do best in full sun. Its vibrant colors and bid of cheer make it truly an amazing plant.
